I have just taken 2 minutes and according to IMDB there is 6 episodes in the first season but there is only 3 in the torrent, the other two are fine as the second season was actually just made up of two feature length christmas specials but the first season is definitely incomplete
No, it's not incomplete. Season 1 had 3 episodes. Season 2 had 3 episodes but when they released the DVD they lumped them in together and called them all season 1. This has every episode ever made.

The first run of three episodes screened on BBC Four from 19 May 2005. A further three episodes were transmitted 20 October â 3 November 2005. The six episodes were repeated on BBC Two in early 2006, and later on BBC America together as a single series. The subsequent DVD release of all six episodes describes the episodes as The Complete First Series.

Taken from wikipedia.
